question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. the 'STOP' sign
B. white board
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The 'STOP' sign is mounted on a pole in the foreground, while the white board is on the side of a building in the background, making the depth relationship very obvious.
